overview: Mr. Goode has 19 years experience in medical device and capital equipment sales. He spent 13 years with Sofamor Danek Inc. in sales management of spinal implants and was Vice President of Sales for Medtronicâ€™s Surgical Navigation Division after their acquisition of Sofamor Danek. During that time Mr. Goode developed and implemented the sales plan for the StealthStation image guided surgery system for cranial, spine, and ultimately orthopedic surgical procedures. Mr. Goode then spent 4 years as Vice President of Sales for Accuray where he developed and implemented the sales plan for the CyberKnife image guided radiosurgery system. One of his areas of focus will be on the development and implementation of the commercialization plan for the Pathfinder products.
